Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class ContactsController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.ContactsController
@Controller public class ContactsController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with contacts.
Since:
2/1/2022
Author:
Ian Black img1007@sru.edu, Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

  • Method Details

    • showContactList

      @RequestMapping("/contacts") public String showContactList(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds all of the contacts to the "contacts" model and redirects user to the contacts page.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "contacts"

    • showContactSignUpForm

      @RequestMapping("/signupcontact") public String showContactSignUpForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Contacts contact, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-contact page
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      contact - Stores information on the contact to be added
      result - Ensures inputs from the user are valid
      Returns:
      "/add/add-contact"

    • addContact

      @RequestMapping("/addcontact") public String addContact(@Validated Contacts contacts, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a contact to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the contact is saved in the contactsRepository. and the user is redirect to /contacts
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-contact page.
      Parameters:
      contacts - Stores information on the contact to be added
      result - Checks user inputs to ensure they are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/contacts" or "/add/add-contact"

    • deleteContact

      @GetMapping("/deletecontact/{id}") public String deleteContact(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a contact using the id parameter and if found, redirects user to delete confirmation page Checks if dependencies are empty before deleting it.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the contact to be deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "contacts" or "/delete/deletecontactconfirm"

    • deleteContactConfirmation

      @GetMapping("/deletecontactconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteContactConfirmation(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a contact using the id parameter and if found, deletes the contact and redirects to contacts page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the contact being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/contacts"

    • viewContact

      @GetMapping("/viewcontact/{id}") public String viewContact(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a contact using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that contact to the view contact page
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the contact to be viewed
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/view/view-contact"

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/editcontact/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a contact using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that contact to a form and redirects the user to that update form.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the contact to be edited
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "update/update-contact"

    • updateContact

      @PostMapping("/updatecontact/{id}") public String updateContact(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated Contacts contact, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates a contact to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the contact is updated in the contactsRepository. and the user is redirected to /contacts
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-contact page.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the ID of the contact to be updated
      contact - Stores information on the contact that will be updated
      result - Checks user inputs to ensure they are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/contacts"

    • getLoggedInUser

      public User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the user that is currently logged into the system.
      If there is no user logged in, null is returned.
      Returns:
      user2 or null
